CustomField.description: Time taken for the work order to be assigned bucket. Used for reporting purpose
CustomField.formula: IF ( SVMXC__TimeToAssign__c <=2, "Less Than 2 hours", IF ( SVMXC__TimeToAssign__c <= 6, "2 To 6 hrs", IF ( SVMXC__TimeToAssign__c <= 10, "6 to 10 hrs", "Over 10 hrs")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time taken for the work order to be assigned bucket. Used for reporting purpose
CustomField.label: Time to Assign Bucket
